程序包的使用
org.openqa.selenium.interactions

  • 使用org.openqa.selenium.interactions的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.openqa.selenium.chrome  
    org.openqa.selenium.edge  
    org.openqa.selenium.firefox  
    org.openqa.selenium.ie

  • org.openqa.selenium.chrome使用的org.openqa.selenium.interactions中的类 
    类和说明
    HasInputDevices
    Interface implemented by each driver that allows access to the raw input devices.
    HasTouchScreen
    Interface implemented by each driver that allows access to touch screen capabilities.
    TouchScreen
    Interface representing basic touch screen operations.
  • org.openqa.selenium.edge使用的org.openqa.selenium.interactions中的类 
    类和说明
    HasInputDevices
    Interface implemented by each driver that allows access to the raw input devices.
  • org.openqa.selenium.firefox使用的org.openqa.selenium.interactions中的类

    Interface implemented by each driver that allows access to the raw input devices.
  • org.openqa.selenium.ie使用的org.openqa.selenium.interactions中的类 
    类和说明
    HasInputDevices
    Interface implemented by each driver that allows access to the raw input devices.
  • org.openqa.selenium.interactions使用的org.openqa.selenium.interactions中的类 
    类和说明
    Action
    Interface representing a single user-interaction action.
    ActionChainExecutor
    Interface representing an operation that allows to execute an action chain.
    Actions
    The user-facing API for emulating complex user gestures.
    CompositeAction
    An action for aggregating actions and triggering all of them at the same time.
    Keyboard
    Interface representing basic, low-level keyboard operations.
    Mouse
    Interface representing basic mouse operations.
    TouchScreen
    Interface representing basic touch screen operations.
  • org.openqa.selenium.interactions.internal使用的org.openqa.selenium.interactions中的类 
    类和说明
    Action
    Interface representing a single user-interaction action.
    TouchScreen
    Interface representing basic touch screen operations.
